name: Innovation Squad
missionStatement: Driving innovation and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in our organization.
objectives: Foster a culture of innovation across the organization
Collaborate with other teams to implement innovative solutions
helpAndSupport: For any questions or support regarding innovation projects, please contact our squad lead or visit our internal innovation portal.

projects.name: AI-Powered Customer Service
projects.description: Developing an AI chatbot to improve customer service efficiency and satisfaction.

projects.name: Blockchain for Supply Chain
projects.description: Exploring the use of blockchain technology to enhance transparency and traceability in our supply chain.

projects.name: VR Training Program
projects.description: Creating a virtual reality training program for new employees to improve onboarding and skill development.

projects.name: IoT-Enabled Smart Office
projects.description: Implementing Internet of Things devices to create a more efficient and comfortable work environment.
